 @b{Druckerey=}
  
 [5.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_5_1@2{Vorrede.}

Manc1643_44_LVM_5_4@v{Geiſtreiche} @l{Theologus Doct. Philip. Nicolai} @v{ſchreibet in ſeinem}

Manc1643_44_LVM_5_7@v{druckerey.} @l{Philip. Melanchton} @v{ſaget: Es ſey} @l{Donum divinitus}

 @b{Ehren}

Manc1643_44_LVM_6_7@v{So iſt es einer Statt auch viel rühmlicher daß ſie jhre eigene}

Manc1643_44_LVM_6_23@v{Jch aber bey ſo ſchwerer blutſawer Arbeit jhnen bey weitem nicht}

Manc1643_44_LVM_6_27@v{ren eine ſchlechte anzahl} @l{Exemplaria} @v{nicht können vereuſſert werden.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_6_28@v{Nicht alleine aber iſt mir der ſchlechte Abzug dieſes Ohrtes an mei-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_6_29@v{ner Handthierung vnd Wolfahrt hinderlich/ ſondern der Mangel}
Manc1643_44_LVM_6_30@v{des Werckzeuges vnd der Geſellen/ die man gar übel herein bringen}
Manc1643_44_LVM_6_31@v{kan/ welches mein Seliger Vorfahr Nicolaus Mollyn in ſeinem 40.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_6_32@v{Jährigen Dienſte wol empfunden/ vnd ich (erbarms Gott) auch}
Manc1643_44_LVM_6_33@v{erfahren muß. So ſpüre ich auch daher groſſen Schaden vnd Nach-}

 @b{dem}
  
 [7.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_1@2{Vorrede.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_2@v{dem} @l{Anno 1591.} @v{gegebenem Statt=} @l{Privilegio} @v{zu wider/ davon}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_3@v{geſchieden worden.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_4@v{Vnd gehet numehr in der Welt ſo zu/ wenn der Buchdrucker}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_5@v{vor ſich ſelbſtẽ nicht/ ſondern alles in Buchhändler Verlag Drucket/}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_6@v{wenig Profytt hat/ derhalben ſeinen Geſellen auch wenig geben kan/}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_7@v{Dannenhero es gekommen das die Geſellen bey gantzen Compagni-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_8@v{en in den Krieg gezogen vnd vmbkommen/ alſo das gantz Teutſch-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_9@v{land dero ißt{itzt} mangel leidet/vnd keiner ſein Kind ſchier mehr die Kunſt}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_10@v{zu lernen geben wil. Jedoch kan ich das mit Wahrheit ſagen/ das ich}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_11@v{in der Statt Breßlaw vornehme Leut Kinder gekant/ die dieſe Edle}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_12@v{Kunſt Buchdruckerey (nur zu Luſt/ auch jhre Gelder zu erſparen/ vnd}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_13@v{frembde Länder in jhrer Jugend zu beſehen/) gelernet/ Hernach da}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_14@v{ſie wieder Anheyme kommen/ jhrer Väter Nahrung/ alß Brau-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_15@v{werck/ Meltzwerck vnd ander dinge fortgeſtellet/ vnd damit ſich}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_16@v{genehret.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_17@v{Traun vnſer allergnädigſter König vnd Herr in Schweden/}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_18@v{alß ein ſonderbahrer Liebhaber dieſer Kunſt hat nicht alleine eigene}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_19@v{Druckereyen in ſeinem Reiche zufertigen laſſen/ ſonder Er hilfft auch}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_20@v{dieſer Kunſt erfahrene beſter maſſen auff/ verſiehet ſie mit freyen}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_21@v{Wohnungen vnd gewiſſen anſehnlichen} @l{Salariis,} @v{ja ſchaffer Bücher/}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_22@v{ſo zwar nie durch den Druck publiciert vnd vbergiebet ſie auff ſeinen}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_23@v{Vnkoſten zum Druck/ vnd verſchicket ſie hernach in groſſer anzahl an}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_24@v{frembde öhrter/ damit alſo frembden Nationen die reine Evangeli-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_25@v{ſche Leere nicht allein bekant/ ſondern das Reich Chriſti daſelbſt ge-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_26@v{pflantzet werde/ wie dann noch newlich vnſer Kinder Catechiſmus in}
Manc1643_44_LVM_7_27@v{Reuſcher oder Moßcowitiſcher Sprache/ vnd mit ſodanen literen}

 [13.lpp.]

Manc1643_44_LVM_18_24@v{Erbawung der Chriſtlichen Kirche gereichen möchte: Vnd dem-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_18_25@v{nach an ſtat der Epiſtoliſchen lectionen, ſo beſagter Einfalt be-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_18_26@v{frembdlich vnd ſchwer vorzukommen angeſehen/ ein oder/ nach ge-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_18_27@v{legenheit/ nur ein halb Capittel außm Syrachsbüchlein vorgeleſen/}
Manc1643_44_LVM_18_28@v{habs auch hernach im examine, ſo laut der Churiſchen Kirchenord-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_18_29@v{nung ich jährlich zwey mahl in der Kirchen gehalten/ befunden/}
Manc1643_44_LVM_18_30@v{daß/ GOtt lob/ viel damit außgerichtet. Vber das/ hab ich in den}
Manc1643_44_LVM_18_31@v{angeſtelten Betſtunden/ an ſtat der lection, den Syrach nicht allein}
Manc1643_44_LVM_18_32@v{geleſen/ ſondern auch alſo bald eine gar einfältige Gloß für die Vn-}

Manc1643_44_LVM_18_34@l{lii ſemper fuit non verboſa ruſticitas, ſed ſancta ſimplicitas.}

Manc1643_44_LVM_19_1@2{An den Leſer.}

Manc1643_44_LVM_23_1@2{An den Lettiſchen Leſer.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_2bähda pehtz Deewu/ ney pehtz Däbbäſẜu/ ney tas apghada
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_3ẜawu Dwehſẜel/ vnd tahdam buhtu labbagk biyis/ ka tas mu-
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_4ſcham nhe buhtu peedſimmis. Tapehtz gir Deews arridſan
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_5tick ghauſche ẜohdiyis tohß leelus @t{Matth. 11} Pillis Chorazin/ Bettſai-
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_6da/ Capernaum/ tadehļ Wings draude ẜuhtiet @t{Am. 8.} muhſchigu
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_7Baddu vnd Twiekſchanu/ tadehļ ẜacka Wings/ @t{Ezec. 2.} tahdeem
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_8Nhebehdneekem buhß Vgguny ißkuſt/ @t{Eſa. 6.} teem buhß tuck-
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_9ſcheem pohſtem pallickt. Vnd to Ꞩohdibu äſẜam mehß
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_10ſchinny Semme (Deewam ſchähl) arridſan ghan redſe-
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_11yuſſchi vnd paſſchi juttuſſchi. Bett ja mehß ghribbam/ ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_12Deewam buhß mißtees no ẜawas Bahrẜibas/ vnd vs mums
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_13ghreeſt tas Atzis ẜawas Schälaſtibas/ tad laideeta mums
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_14Winya Wahrdu no Ꞩirrds dibben mieļoht.
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_15Vnd ka nhe weenam ja=ẜuhds/ winyam nhe äſẜohtz
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_16Deewa Wahrds lieds pillam/ tad äßmu es ar leelu darrbu
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_17ſcho Ghramatu/ ick=kattram Ꞩaimneekam par labb/ ẜataiſ-
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_18ẜiyis/ ja taß ta noteekahs/ ka Wings nhe ſpähtu Baßnizà
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_19nahkt/ tad Wings tomähr ẜawà Mahyà no ẜawu Bährnu/
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_20jeb no zittu ghodigu Zillwäku/ kas laſẜiet mahk/ warr licktes
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_21preekſcha Laſẜitees/ vnd allaſchien kur buhdams vs Deewa
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_22Wahrdu domaht/ vnd no to runnaht.
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_23Tapehtz nhe apraudi/ manns Draugs/ to Naudu/
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_24ko tu par ſcho Ghramatu ißdohd/ bett apdohma kahdu lee-
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_25lu Manntu vnd Dahwanu tu tawai Dwehſẜeley eſẜi dab-
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_26buyees.
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_27Daſſch ißpliete vnd apdſerr weenà deenà wairahk/
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_28vnd tickai leelohß Ghräkohß ekriet/ vnd Deewu apkaitina/

Manc1643_44_LVM_23_31mums ghodige dſiewoht buhß? Ja=tad nu juhß arridſan
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_32Deewu vnd winya Wahrdu mieļohſẜeeta/ tad Deews jums
Manc1643_44_LVM_23_33ẜwehtieß/ ẜahtenahß/ vnd Ghauſẜenas ſcheit Laizige vnd pehtz

 [24.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_24_1@2{An den Lettiſchen Leſer.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_24_2Meeſẜas/ tee Augli tawas Druwas/ vnd tee Augļi ta-
Manc1643_44_LVM_24_3wo Lohpo/ vnd tee Augļi tawo Wehrſſcho/ vnd tee
Manc1643_44_LVM_24_4Augļi tawo Auyo/ ẜwehtietz buhß taws Kurrwis/ vñ

Manc1643_44_LVM_31_22@v{Tit. 2. Cap.}

Manc1643_44_LVM_31_25beßdeewigu Buhſchanu/ vnnd to paſẜauligu Kahribu/
Manc1643_44_LVM_31_26vnd ghaddige/ taißne/ vnd ẜwäte dſiewoht ſchinni Paſẜaule/

Manc1643_44_LVM_31_29katters patts muhſẜo dehļ nodeweeß gir/ ka tas mums atpe-
 @b{ſtitu}
  
 [32.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_32_1ſtitu no wiſẜenadas Nhetaißnibas/ vnd ſöw paſſcham ſkieſti-

 @b{tee}
  
 [33.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_33_1tee biyayahß ļohte. Vnd tas Engels ẜatziya vs teem:

 @b{weenas}

Manc1643_44_LVM_38_16Spahrneem/ vnd juhß nhe gribbeyaht? Raugi/ juhſ-
Manc1643_44_LVM_38_17ẜam Nammam buhß pohſt atſtatam tapt. Aiſto es ẜacku

Manc1643_44_LVM_38_21@v{Lection am Tage Johannis/ des Apoſtels}
Manc1643_44_LVM_38_22@v{vnd Evangeliſten/ Syrach 15. Cap.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_38_23TO nhe darra nhe weens/ ka kaß to Kungu byſtahs/ vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_38_24kas ẜöw py Deewu Wahrdu turrahs/ tas atrohd to.
Manc1643_44_LVM_38_25Vnd winja tam ẜaſtaps/ ka kahda Mahte/ vnd to ẜajems
Manc1643_44_LVM_38_26ka kahda jauna Brute. Winja to ähdenahß ar Mais tahs
Manc1643_44_LVM_38_27Ꞩapraſẜchanas/ vnd to dſirrdinahß ar Vdeni tahs Ghuddri-
Manc1643_44_LVM_38_28bas. Zaur to tas ſtippris kļuß/ ka tas ſtippre ſtaweht warr/
Manc1643_44_LVM_38_29vnd ẜöw py winjas turrehſẜees/ ka tas kaunà nhe kļuhſt. Win-
 @b{ja to}
  
 [39.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_1ja to pa=auxtenahß par ẜawu Tuwaku/ vnd tam ẜawu Mutt
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_2attplehties pulkà. Winja to appuſchkohß ar Preeku vnd Lyx-
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_3mibu/ vnd ar muhſchigu Wahrdu apdawenahß. Bett tee

Manc1643_44_LVM_39_6neeki nhe ſinna nheneeka no tahs.
  
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_7@v{Evangelium am Tage Johannis des Apo-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_8@v{ſtels vnd Evangeliſten/ Johan: 21.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_9JEſus ẜatziya vs Peteri/ ſtaiga man pehts. Bett

Manc1643_44_LVM_39_11ſtaigayoſchu/ kattru JEſus myļoya/ katters arridſan
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_12py winja Kruhteem Wackara=ähdeni (@l{alij}) Wackerinya
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_13ghulleyis by/ vnd ẜatziyis/ Kungs/ kaß gir tas/ kas töw
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_14peewils? Kad Peteris ẜcho redſeya/ ẜacka tas vs JEſu/
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_15Kungs/ bett ko buhß ſchim? JEſus ẜacka vs to: Ja es
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_16ghribbu/ ka tam pallickt
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_17buhß/ teekams es nahku/
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_18ko tu par to bähda? Stai-
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_19ga tu man pehts. Tas iß-
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_20pauda weena Walloda ſtar-
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_21pan teem Brahļeem/ Schiß
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_22Mazekļis nhe mirrſt. Vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_23JEſus nhe ẜatziya vs to/
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_24wings nhe mirrſt/ bett ja es
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_25ghribbu/ ka tam pallickt buhß/ teekams es nahku/ ko tu
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_26par to bähda? Ꞩchiß gir tas Mazeklis/ kas no ſchahm
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_27leetahm leezibu dohd/ vnd gir ſcho raxtiyis/ vnd mehs
Manc1643_44_LVM_39_28ſinnam/ ka winja Leeziba teeſẜa gir.

 [40.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_40_1@v{Epiſtel am Sontage nach dem Chriſtage/}
Manc1643_44_LVM_40_2@v{Gal. 4.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_40_3MYļi Braļi/ es ẜacku/ tick illge ka tas Manteneex Bährus
Manc1643_44_LVM_40_4gir/ nhe gir ſtarpan to vnd Kallpu kahda Noſkirrſcha-
Manc1643_44_LVM_40_5na: Jepſche wings Kungs gir par wiſẜu Manntu/ bett

Manc1643_44_LVM_40_7ihß to nolicktu laiku no Tähwu. Tha mehs arridſan/ kad

 @b{eekſchan}
  
 [46.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_46_1eekſchan to/ kas mannam Tähwam peedärr? Vnnd tee

 @b{vnnd}
  
 [53.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_53_1vnnd Teickẜchanu/ zaur weenu Ballxnu/ kattra vs winju
Manc1643_44_LVM_53_2ẜchawehß no to leelu Ghohdu/ ar ẜcheem Wahrdeem: Ꞩchiß
Manc1643_44_LVM_53_3gir manns mieļais Dähls/ katters mann patiek. Vnnd ſcho
Manc1643_44_LVM_53_4Ballxnu äſẜam mehs no Däbbäſſu dſirrdeyuẜchi nahkam/
Manc1643_44_LVM_53_5buhdami ar winju/ wirß to ẜwähtu kallnu. Mums gir weens
Manc1643_44_LVM_53_6ſtippris Proweeto=Wahrds/ vnnd juhß darrait pareiſe/ ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_53_7juhß to währà jemmeeta/ ka kahdu Ꞩwetz/ kattra ſpied kah-

Manc1643_44_LVM_53_12nhe kahda Papreekſche=Ꞩluddenaẜchana muhẜcham nhe gir

Manc1643_44_LVM_53_15ka taß Ꞩwähtz{Ꞩwãhtz} Gharrs tohß gir mahzijis.)

 @b{manns}
  
 [54.lpp.]

Manc1643_44_LVM_58_11bas. Vnnd kad es ghribbätohß leelitees/ nhe darritu es ta-

 @b{ckallta}
  
 [59.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_1ckallta tha/ tapehtz ka tai nhe kahds ſlappyums by.
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_2Vnd zitta kritta widdu ſtarrp teems Ehrſcheems/ vnnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_3tee Ehrſchi vsdiega lieds/ vnd apmahze to. Vnd zitta
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_4kritta wirß labbas Semmes/ vnd ta vsdiega/ vnd neſẜe
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_5ẜimbt=kahrtigus augļus. To ẜatzidams/ ẜautze wings/
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_6kam Auſẜis gir dſirrdeht/ tas laid dſirrd.
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_7Bett winja Mahzekļi
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_8jautaya tam/ vnnd ẜatziya/
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_9kas ſchy liedſiba äſẜoti?
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_10Bett taß ẜatziya/ Jums gir
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_11dohts ſinnaht to Apſlehp-
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_12ſchanu tahß Deewa Wall-
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_13ſtibas/ bett zitteems zaur
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_14liedſibu/ ka tee to nhe räds/
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_15jeb tee to ghann räds/ vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_16nhe ẜaproht/ jebb tee to ghann dſirrd.
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_17Bett ſchie gir ta liedſiba/ Ta Ꞩähkla gir tas Deewa
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_18Wahrds. Bett kattra zeļļmaly gir/ tee gir tee/ kattri to
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_19dſirrd/ pehtz nahk tas Wälls/ vnd jämm to wahrdu no
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_20winja Ꞩirrdeems/ tadehļ ka tee nhe titzätu/ vnnd ſwähti
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_21taptu. Bett tee wirſẜon to zeetu Ackmini/ gir tee/ kad tee
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_22to dſirrd/ vsjäm̃ te to Wahrdu preezadameeß/ vñ teems
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_23nhe gir nhe kadas Ꞩacknes. Weenu maſu briedi titz
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_24tee/ vnd Kahrdenaſchanas laikà tee nokriet. Bett kat-
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_25tra ſtarrpan teems Ehrſcheems kritta/ gir tee/ kattri to
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_26dſirrd/ vs dohdahß vs to ghahdaſchanu tahß baggati-
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_27bas vnd Kahribas tahß dſiewibas/ vnd apſlahp/ vnnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_59_28nhe näß nhe kahdus augļus. Bett kattra wirſẜon to
 @b{labbu}
  
 [60.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_1labbu ẜemm/ gir tee/ kattri to Wahrdu dſirrd/ vnd pat-
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_2turr to eekſchan labbu Ꞩirrdi/ vnd näß augļus eekſchan
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_3Pazeeſchanas (@v{oder} Zeeßdami).

Manc1643_44_LVM_60_5@l{Eſto mihi,} @v{1. Corinth. 13.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_6MYļi Brahli/ kad es ar Zillwäko vnd Engeļo mehlehms
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_7runnatu/ vnd mann nhe buhtu ta mieleſtiba/ tad buhtu

Manc1643_44_LVM_60_9Swahrgulls. Vnd kad es warrähtu papreeſch ſluddenaht/
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_10vnd ſinnatu wiſẜu=Apſlehpſchanu/ vnd wiſẜu Atſiſchanu/ vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_11mann buhtu wiſẜa Titziba/ tha/ ka es Kallnus warrätu vs
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_12zittu weetu ſtattieth/ vnd mann nhe buhtu ta Mieläſtiba/ tad
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_13nhe buhtu es nheneeka. Vnnd kad es wiſẜu ẜawu Manntu
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_14teems Vbbagheems dohtu/ ẜawu Meeſẜu lickdams deckt/ vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_15mann nhe buhtu ta Mieläſtiba/ Tad nhe palliedſätu tas
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_16mann nheneeka. Ta mieläſtiba gir lehnprahtiga vnd laipni-
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_17ga/ ta mieläſtiba nhe gir ſkaudiga/ ta mieläſtiba nhe darra
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_18blehdibu/ ta ẜöw nhe vspuhſchahß/ ta nhe turrahß ẜöw nhet-
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_19tickle/ ta nhe meckle ẜawu ghohdu/ ta nhe leekahß ẜabarrgho-
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_20tees/ ta nhe ghahda vs ļaunu/ ta nhe preezayahß tahß nhe-
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_21taißnibas/ bett ta preezayahs tahß taißnibas/ ta pa=näß wiſ-
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_22ẜas leetas/ ta titz wiſẜu/ ta zerre wiſẜas leetas/ ta zeeſch wiſẜas
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_23leetas. Ta mieläſtiba nhe peekuhſt/ jeb ghann ta Preekſch=
Manc1643_44_LVM_60_24ſluddenaſchana mittehſẜees/ vnd tahß Wallodas mittehſẜees/

 @b{ihs}
  
 [61.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_61_1ihs waighu. Nu atſieſtu es to ka weenu=ghabbaladarrbu/
Manc1643_44_LVM_61_2bett tad es to atſieſchu ihten ka es attſietz äßmu. Bett nu
Manc1643_44_LVM_61_3palleek ta Titziba/ zerriba/ Mieläſtiba/ ſche trieß/ bett ta Mie-
Manc1643_44_LVM_61_4läſtiba gir ta leelaka ſtarpan teem.

Manc1643_44_LVM_61_7JEſus jehme tohß Diwipadeßmittus (mahzekļus)

 @b{Bett}
  
 [62.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_62_1Bett tas brehze wehl wairahk: Tu Dawida Dähls/
Manc1643_44_LVM_62_2abſchäloyeeß par mann. Bett JEſus ſtahweya kluß/

Manc1643_44_LVM_62_10tri to redſeya/ ſlaweya Deewu.

 @b{attkall}
  
 [64.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_64_1attkall raxtietz/ töw nhe buhß Deewu tawu Kunghu
Manc1643_44_LVM_64_2kahrdenaht.
Manc1643_44_LVM_64_3Attkall wedde to tas Wälls ar ẜöw/ vs weenu loht

Manc1643_44_LVM_64_6es töw wiſẜunotaļļ doht/ ja tu ſemme krittieſẜi/ vnnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_64_7mann peeluhxi. Tad ẜatziya JEſus vs to/ Attkahpeeß

Manc1643_44_LVM_64_9wu tawu Kunghu peeluhkt/ vnnd tam ween kallpoht.

Manc1643_44_LVM_64_11tee Engeļi py to/ vnd kallpoya tam.

Manc1643_44_LVM_65_22tziya/ Ja Kungs/ bett tomähr ähd tee Ꞩunniſchi no teems
Manc1643_44_LVM_65_23Drußzinņeems/ kattri no winjo Kungo ghalldu nokriet.

Manc1643_44_LVM_65_25wa/ tawa Titziba gir leela/ töw noteek/ ka tu ghribbi. Vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_65_26winjas Meita tappa wäſẜäla/ tanny paſſchà ſtundà.
 @b{Epiſtel}
  
 [66.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_1@v{Epiſtel am dritten Sontage in der Faſten/}
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_2@v{genant} @l{Oculi,} @v{Epheſ. 5.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_3MYļi Brahļi/ eſẜeta Deewa pehtz ſtaighatayi/ ka tee myļi
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_4Bährni/ vnd ſtaighay/ eeta eekſchan tahs mylaſtibas/ ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_5CHriſtus mums myļoyis gir/ vñ ẜöw paſẜchu nodeweeß
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_6par dahwanu vnd Vpperi Deewam par ẜalldu Ꞩmarrſchu.
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_7Bett Mauzibu vnd wiſẜu Nheſkieſtibu/ jeb Nheghauſẜibu/ nhe
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_8laideeta no jums ißpauſt/ ka teems Ꞩwähteems klahyahß/
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_9Arridſan beßkaunigus Wahrdus vnd jeckigu Tehrſeſchanu/
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_10jeb gļaudu/ kattri jums nhe klahyahß/ bett jo wairahk Pat-
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_11teitziba. Aiſto to buhß jums ſinnaht/ ka nhe weenam Mau-
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_12zeneekam/ jeb nheſkieſtam/ jeb nhegauſcham (katters gir
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_13weens ällkadeewa Kallps) nheneekada daļļa gir py to Wall-
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_14ſtibu CHriſti vnd Deewa.
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_15Nhe leezeetees jums no nhe weenu peewillt/ ar wellte
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_16Wahrdeems/ aiſto todehl nahk Deewa Dußmiba/ par teems
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_17Bährneems tahß Nhetitzibas. Tapehtz nhe eſẜeeta winjo
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_18Beedri. Aiſto juhß biyaht zittkahrt Tumſẜiba/ bett nu eſẜeeta
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_19juhß weena Ghaißma eekſchan to Kungu. Staighayeeta ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_20tee Bährni tahß ghaiſchumas. Tee augli tha gharra gir
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_21wiſẜenada laipniba/ vnd Taißniba/ vnd Patteeſẜiba.

Manc1643_44_LVM_66_23@v{ſten/ genant} @l{Oculi,} @v{Luc. 11.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_24TAs Kungs JEſus ißdſinna weenu Wällu/ tas by
Manc1643_44_LVM_66_25Mähms. Vnd tas notickahß/ kad tas Wälls iß-

 [73.lpp.]

Manc1643_44_LVM_73_6@v{Philipper 2.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_73_7MYļi Brahļi/ Jck weenam buhß tahdu prahtu turreht/
Manc1643_44_LVM_73_8ka JEſu CHriſto arridſan by/ katters/ jeb tas ghann

Manc1643_44_LVM_73_10tas to kahdu laupiſchanu äſẜam/ Deewam liedſahns buht/
Manc1643_44_LVM_73_11bett wings patz ẜöw ſämmoyayahß/ vnd vs jehmehs weenu
Manc1643_44_LVM_73_12Kallpa ghiem/ tappa ihten ka zittz Zillwähx/ vnd no dabbu ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_73_13kahds Zillwähx attraſts/ wings patz ẜöw ſämmoyayahß/ vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_73_14tappa paklauſẜiegs ihs tay Nahwei/ ja ihs tay Nahwei py
Manc1643_44_LVM_73_15kruſtu. Tapehtz gir to arridſan Deews pa=auxtenayis/ vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_73_16gir tam weenu Wahrdu dehwis/ katters par wiſẜeem Wahr-
Manc1643_44_LVM_73_17deem gir/ ka eekſchan to Wahrdu JEſu lohzitees buhß wiſ-
Manc1643_44_LVM_73_18ẜeem zeļļeem/ kattri eekſchan Däbbäſẜu/ vnd wirſẜon Sem-

 @b{ru/ to}
  
 [81.lpp.]

Manc1643_44_LVM_81_12Kad tas nu winyo Kahyas maßghayis by/ jehme
Manc1643_44_LVM_81_13tas ẜawas Drehbes/ vnd noẜähdahß attkaļ vnd ẜatzi-
Manc1643_44_LVM_81_14ya attkal vs teem: Sinnaht juhß/ ko es jums äßmu

Manc1643_44_LVM_81_16vnd runnayeeta teeſcham/ Aiſto tas es äßmu arridſan.
Manc1643_44_LVM_81_17Ja tad es nu juhſẜo Meiſteris vnd Kungs/ jums tahß
Manc1643_44_LVM_81_18Kahyas äßmu maßghayis/ tad buhß jums arridſan
Manc1643_44_LVM_81_19weens ohtram tahß Kahyas maßghaht. Weenu Mah-
Manc1643_44_LVM_81_20zibu es jums äßmu dewis/ ka juhß darraita/ ka es jums
Manc1643_44_LVM_81_21äßmu darriyis. Pattees/ pattees es ẜacku jums: Tas
Manc1643_44_LVM_81_22Kallps nhe gir auxtahx ka winja Kungs/ neds tas
Manc1643_44_LVM_81_23Ꞩuhtietz auxtahx ka tas kas to ẜuhtiyis gir: Ja juhß
Manc1643_44_LVM_81_24to ſinnaht/ ſwähti eſẜeeta juhß/ ja juhß to darraita.

Manc1643_44_LVM_81_28gad ẜacku es to jums/ pirrms tas noteek/ ka kad tas gir
 @b{notitzis/}
  
 [82.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_82_1notitzis/ juhß to titzaht/ ka es tas äßmu. Pattees/ pat-
Manc1643_44_LVM_82_2tees es ẜacku jums/ kas vsjämm/ ja es kahdy ẜuhtiſchu/
Manc1643_44_LVM_82_3tas mann vs jämm. Bett kas mann vsjämm/ tas vs-
Manc1643_44_LVM_82_4jämm to/ kas mann ẜuhtiyis gir.

Manc1643_44_LVM_82_14vs to/ weens pehtz ohtru: Kungs äßmu es tas? Vnd

Manc1643_44_LVM_82_24@l{(puta} äſẜohtz.

 @b{Aiſto}
  
 [83.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_83_1Aiſto tas patz ghulleya py JEſu Kruhti/ vnnd ẜatziya

 @b{turr}
  
 [88.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_88_1turr ar Lahpahm/ Ꞩwetzehm/ ar Sobenneem vnnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_88_2Nuhyahm.
Manc1643_44_LVM_88_3Bett tas Willteneex by teem weenu Siem dewis/
Manc1643_44_LVM_88_4vnnd ẜatziyis: Kattru es ſkuhpſtieſchu/ tas gir tas/ to

Manc1643_44_LVM_88_6wiſẜas leetas ſinnaya/ kas winjam by notickt/ ißghaya

Manc1643_44_LVM_88_9reth. JEſus ẜatziya vs teem: Es äßmu tas. Bett Ju-
Manc1643_44_LVM_88_10das kas to peewiele/ ſtahweya arridſan py teem. Kad
Manc1643_44_LVM_88_11nu JEſus vs teem ẜatziya/ Es äßmu tas/ atkahpe tee/
Manc1643_44_LVM_88_12vnd kritta py Semmes. Tad waizaya wings tohß att-
Manc1643_44_LVM_88_13kall: Pehtz ko meckleyeeta juhß? Bett tee adbilldeya:

Manc1643_44_LVM_88_15jums ẜatziyis/ ka es tas äſẜohtz/ Ja juhß pehtz mann

Manc1643_44_LVM_88_19mann dewis eſẜi.

 @b{ba=Ghroſ-}
  
 [95.lpp.]

 @b{ſchas.}
  
 [102.lpp.]

Manc1643_44_LVM_115_16@v{Epiſtel am erſten Sontage nach Oſtern/ ge-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_115_17@v{nant} @l{Quaſimodogeniti,} @v{1. Johan. 5.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_115_18JCk kattris kas no Deewu peedſimbtz gir/ tas pahrwarr to
Manc1643_44_LVM_115_19Paſẜaul/ vñ muhſẜa Titziba gir ta Pahrwarreſchana/ kattra
Manc1643_44_LVM_115_20to Paſẜaul pahrwarreyis gir. Bett kas gir/ kas to Paſẜaul
Manc1643_44_LVM_115_21pahrwarr/ ka ween/ kas titz/ ka JEſus Deewa Dähls gir?

Manc1643_44_LVM_122_25ſchan to pillnigu Baußli/ tahß Swabbadibas/ vnd turr eek-
Manc1643_44_LVM_122_26ſchan palleek/ vnnd nhe dſirrd aißmirrßdams/ bett darri-
Manc1643_44_LVM_122_27dams/ tas patz buhß ſwähtz ẜawà darrbà. Bett ja kaßlabba
Manc1643_44_LVM_122_28juhſẜo ſtarrpà zerre/ tas kallpoyohtz Deewam/ vnd nhe wall-
Manc1643_44_LVM_122_29da ẜawu Mehl/ bett peewiļļ ẜawu Ꞩirrdi/ ta Deewa=Kallpo-
 @b{ſchanna}
  
 [123.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_1ſchanna gir wellte. Weena ſkieſta vnnd nheapghanita Dee-
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_2wa=Kallpoſchanna preekſchan Deewu to Tähwu gir ta/ kat-
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_3ters Barinus vnd Attraittnes ẜawahß bähdahß apluhko/ vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_4no tahß Paſẜaules nhe apghanitu paghlabboyahß.
  
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_5@v{Evangelium am fünfften Sontage nach}
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_6@v{Oſtern/ genant} @l{Vocem Iucund.} @v{Joh. 16.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_7JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem Mahzekleem: Pattees/ pat-
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_8tees es ẜacku jums/ ja juhß tam Tähwam ko luhxee-
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_9ta eekſchan mannu Wahr-
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_10du/ tad tas to jums dohß.
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_11Jhß ſchim̃{Jhßſchim̃} nhe eſẜeeta juhß
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_12nheneeka luhguſchi eek-
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_13ſchan mannu Wahrdu.
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_14Luhdſeeta/ tad juhß jemſ-
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_15ẜeeta/ ka juhſẜa liexmiba
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_16pillniga warr buht. Scho
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_17äßmu es jums czaur ẜacka-
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_18meem Wahrdeem runnayis/ bett tas Laix nahk/ ka es
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_19wairs zaur ẜackameem Wahrdeem ar jums nhe runna-
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_20ſchu/ bett jums ſkaidre paſluddenaſchu no ẜawu Tähwu.
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_21Tanny paſſchà Deenà juhß luhkſẜeeta eekſchan mannu
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_22Wahrdu/ vnd es nhe ẜacku jums/ ka es to Tähwu juhſẜo
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_23dehl luhkt ghribbu/ Aiſto tas Tähws patz juhß mylo/ ta-
Manc1643_44_LVM_123_24pehtz/ ka juhß mann myloyeeta/ vnnd titzaht/ ka es no

Manc1643_44_LVM_123_27ſtahyu es to Paſẜaul/ vnnd eemu py Tähwu. Winja

 @b{nhe}
  
 [124.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_1nhe ẜacki nhe kahdu ẜackamu=wahrdu. Nu ſinnam
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_2mehß/ ka tu wiſẜas leetas ſinni/ vnd nhe gir wayagg/ ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_3töw kaßlabban jautha/ tapehtz titzam mehß/ ka tu no
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_4Deewu ißghayis eſẜi.

Manc1643_44_LVM_124_6@v{Actorum 1. Cap.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_7PJrrmayà Ghramatà äßmu es/ mylais Theowile/ run-
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_8nayis no wiſẜu to/ ko JEſus eeẜahka darriet vnd mah-
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_9ziet/ ihß tai Deeny/ kad tas vsjämbtz tappa. Pehtz to
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_10kad tas teem Apuſtuļeem (kattrus tas ißraudſiyees by) zaur
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_11to ſwähtu Gharru pawehleyis by/ kattreem tas pehtz ẜawas
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_12zeeſchanas dſiews paradiyees by/ zaur daſchadu Paradi-
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_13ſchanu/ vnd lickahß redſetees par Tſchettre deßmittahm Dee-
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_14nahm/ vnd runnaya ar teem no Deewa Wallſtibas.
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_15Vnd kad tas tohß ẜapullzeyis by/ pahwehleya tas teem/

Manc1643_44_LVM_124_17Ꞩohliſchanu ta Tähwa/ kattru juhß (ẜatziya tas) no mann
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_18dſirrdeyuſchi eſẜeeta. Aiſto Jahnis gir ar Vhdeni Chriſtiyis/
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_19bett jums buhß ar tu Ꞩwähtu Gharru chriſtiteem tapt/ nhe
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_20illge pehtz ſchahm Deenahm.
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_21Bett tee kattri kohpa ẜaghayuſẜchi by/ jautaya tam/ vnd

Manc1643_44_LVM_124_24därr ſinnaht to laiku/ neds ſtundu/ kattru tas Tähws ẜawà
Manc1643_44_LVM_124_25ſpähkà patturreyees gir. Bett juhß to ſpähku ta Ꞩwähta

 [128.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_128_1Partheri/ vnd Meederi/ vnd Elamiteri/ vnd kattri mehß

Manc1643_44_LVM_128_7tohß leelus Deewa darrbus runnayoſchus. Tee iſẜatruhzena-

Manc1643_44_LVM_128_12@v{Johann. 14. Cap.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_128_13JEſus ẜatziya vs Judda Lebbeo/ vnd teem zittem
Manc1643_44_LVM_128_14Mahzekleem: Kas man myļo/ taß mannu Wahr-
Manc1643_44_LVM_128_15du turrehß/ vnd manns Tähws to myļohß/ vnd mehs

Manc1643_44_LVM_128_18taß Wahrds/ kattru juhß dſirrdaht/ nhe gir manns/ bett

Manc1643_44_LVM_128_28zieß/ vnd jums attminnehß

 @b{To Mee-}
  
 [129.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_1To Meeru atſtahyu es jums/ mannu Meeru doh-
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_2mu es jums/ nhe ka ta Paſẜaule dohd/ dohmu es jums.
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_3Juhſẜai Ꞩirrdei nhe buhß ißtruhzenateeß/ vnd nhe bie-
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_4teeß. Juhß eſẜeeta dſirrdeyuſchi/ ka es jums ẜatziyis äß-
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_5mu/ Es no=eemu vnd atteemu attkal py jums. Kad juhß
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_6mann buhtaht myloyuſchi/ tad buhteeta juhß preezayu-
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_7ſchees/ ka es ẜatziyis äßmu/ Es eemu py Tähwu/ aiſto tas
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_8Tähws gir leelahx nheka es. Vnd nu äßmu es jums to
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_9ſatziyis/ pirrms tas noteek/ Aiſto kad tas nu notix/ ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_10juhß titzaht. Es nu joproyam wairs nhe runnaſchu ar
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_11jums/ aiſto tas Kungs ſchahß Paſẜaules nahk/ vnd tas
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_12nhe attſpeh nheneeka prett mann. Bett ka ta Paſẜaule
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_13attſieſt/ ka es to Tähwu myļoyu/ vnd ka es ta darru/ ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_14mann tas Tähws pawehleyis gir.
  
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_15@v{Epiſtel am Pfingſtmontage/}
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_16@v{Actor. 10. Cap.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_17PEteris ẜatziya vs Cornelio: JEſus CHriſtus gir mums
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_18pawehleyis mahziet tohß Ļaudis/ vnd leezibu doht/ ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_19tas gir zälltz no Deewu par Ꞩohgi teem Dſieweem vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_20Nomirruſcheem. Ꞩchim dohd wiſẜi Proweetes leezibu/ ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_21zaur winja Wahrdu/ wiſẜeem kattri eekſchan to titz/ Pamme-
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_22ſchanu to Ghräko dabbuit buhß.
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_23Kad Peteris wehl ſchohß Wahrdus runnaya/ kritta tas
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_24Ꞩwähtz Gharrs vs teem wiſẜem/ kattri to Wahrdu dſirr-
Manc1643_44_LVM_129_25deya. Vnd tee Titzigi no tahß Apghraiſiſchanas/ kattri ar

Manc1643_44_LVM_136_21@v{Epiſtel am andern Sontage nach Trinita-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_136_22@v{tis/ 1. Joh. 3.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_136_23MAnni Brahli/ nhe brienoyeetees/ ja jums ta Paſẜaule
Manc1643_44_LVM_136_24eenied. Mehß ſinnam/ ka mehß no tahß Nahwes eek-
Manc1643_44_LVM_136_25ſchan tahß Dſiewoſchanas nakuſſchi äſẜam/ aiſto mehß
Manc1643_44_LVM_136_26myļoyam tohß Brahļus. Kas to Brahli nhe myļo/ tas pal-
Manc1643_44_LVM_136_27leek Nahweh. Kas ẜawu Brahli eenied/ tas gir weens Släpp-

 @b{muhſchi-}
  
 [137.lpp.]

 @b{dſan}
  
 [144.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_144_1dſan eekſchan jaunu Dſiewoſchanu ſtaighaht. Bett ka mehß nu

Manc1643_44_LVM_151_4JEſum parr Kungu ẜauckt/ ka ween zaur to ſwätu{ſwàtu} Gharru.
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_5Tur gir daſchadi Dahwani/ bett tur gir weens Gharrs/
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_6vnd tur gir daſchadi Ammati/ bett tur gir weens Kungs/ vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_7tur gir daſchada Spehziba/ bett tur gir weens Deews katters
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_8ſtrahda wiſẜas leetas eekſchan wiſẜeem. Eekſchan ick=kattru
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_9parahdahß ẜöw tahß dahwanas tha Gharra/ par labbu tai
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_10draudſei. Zittam tohp dohta zaur to Gharru ta Runna-
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_11ſchana (Walloda/) no tahß Ghuddribas. Zittam tohp doh-
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_12ta ta Runnaſchana no tahß Atſiſchanas pehtz to paſſchu
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_13Gharru/ zittam ta Titziba eekſchan to paſſchu Gharru/ zit-
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_14tam ta dahwana Wäſẜälu darriet eekſchan to paſſchu Ghar-
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_15ru/ zittam Brienumus darriet/ zittam Mahziſchana/ zittam
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_16Gharrus Jßpraſt/ zittam daſchada Mehle/ zittam tahß meh-
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_17les Jß=ſtahſtiet. Bett ſcho wiſẜu darra tas patz weeniegs
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_18Gharrs/ vnd ißdalla ickweenam to Dahwanu ka tam pattiek.
  
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_19@v{Evangelium am zehenden Sontage nach}
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_20@v{Trinitatis/ Luc. 19.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_21KAd JEſus tuwe klaht
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_22py Jeruſalemes nah-
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_23ze/ vsluhkoya tas to Pili/
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_24vnd raudaya par to/ vnnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_25ẜatziya/ Kad tu to ſinnatu/
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_26tad buhtu tu ſchinny tawà
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_27laikà arridſan apdohma-
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_28yuſẜi/ kas py tawu Meeru
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_29wayadſätu. Bett nu gir
Manc1643_44_LVM_151_30tas preekſchan taweem Atzeem paſläptz. Aiſto tas laix
 @b{par töw}
  
 [152.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_1par töw nahx/ ka tawi Waideneeki apkahrt töw vnd ta-
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_2weem Bährneem ar töw/ weenu Rattapili apkahrt töw
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_3ẜittieß/ töw apẜehdehß/ vnnd wiſẜahß mallahß ſpaidieß/
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_4vnd töw ſkieſt iß=pohſtieß/ vnnd nhe weenu Ackmini vs
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_5ohtru atſtahß/ tapehtz/ ka tu nhe eſẜi attſinnuſẜi to laiku/
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_6kad tu peemäckläta eſẜi. Vnd wings ghaya Baſnizà/
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_7vnd eeẜahka ißdſiet/ kattri tur eekſchan pahrdewe vnnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_8pirrka/ vnd ẜatziya vs teems/ tur ſtahw raxtietz/ Mans
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_9Namms gir weens Pahtaronamms/ bett juhß eſẜeeta to
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_10par weenu ſläppkawo beddri darrijuſchi. Vnnd mah-
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_11ziya ick Deenas Baſnizà. Bett tee Auxtibaſnizaskun-
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_12gi vnd Raxtemahzetayi/ vnnd tee Prahwaki ſtarrpan
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_13teem Ļaudeem/ ghadaya/ ka tee to nokautu/ vnnd nhe
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_14attradda ka teems darrieth by. Aiſto wiſẜi Ļaudis pee-
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_15kehrehß tam/ vnd dſirrdeya to.
  
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_16@v{Epiſtel am eilfften Sontage nach Trinita-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_17@v{tis/ 1. Corinth. 15.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_18MYeļi Brahļi/ es attminnu jums to Ewangelium/ ko es
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_19jums paſluddenayis äßmu/ kattru juhß arridſan vsjä-
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_20muſchi eſẜeeta/ eekſchan kattru juhß arridſan ſtahweeta/
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_21zaur kattru juhß arridſan ẜwähti tohpeeta/ ka es jums to
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_22paſluddenayis äßmu/ ja juhß tickai to patturreyuſchi eſẜeeta/
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_23tas warr tad buht/ ka juhß wellte buhtat titzeyuſchi. Aiſto es
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_24äßmu jums papreekſch to dewis/ kattru es arridſan dabbuyis
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_25äßmu/ ka CHriſtus nomirris gir muhſẜo Ghräko dehl/ pehtz
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_26to Raxtu/ vnd ka tas apracktz gir/ vnd ka tas attkall auk-
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_27ſcham zehleeß gir/ treſſchà Deenà/ pehtz to Raxtu. Vnd ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_152_28tas gir rädſähtz no Keewas/ pehtz no teem Diwipaddeßmit-

 @b{teem}
  
 [153.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_153_1teem Brahleem weenà reiſa/ no teems paſſcheems wehl dauds
Manc1643_44_LVM_153_2dſiewo/ bett zitti gir aismigguſchi. Pehtz gir tas rädſahtz no
Manc1643_44_LVM_153_3Jacobu/ pehtz no wiſẜeem Apuſtuļeem. Wiß pehdige pehtz
Manc1643_44_LVM_153_4wiſẜeems gir tas arridſan no man/ ka no kahdu nhelaizigu
Manc1643_44_LVM_153_5dſimbtibu rädſähtz. Aiſto es äßmu tas ſämmakais no teem
Manc1643_44_LVM_153_6Apuſtuļeem/ katters es nhe äßmu zeeniex/ ka mann par A-
Manc1643_44_LVM_153_7puſtuli ẜautz/ tapehtz/ ka es to Deewa Draudſibu pullghayis
Manc1643_44_LVM_153_8äßmu. Bett no Deewa ſchälaſtibas äßmu es/ kas es äßmu/
Manc1643_44_LVM_153_9vnd winja ſchäläſtiba py mann nhe gir wellte biyuſẜi. Bett es
Manc1643_44_LVM_153_10äßmu dauds wairahk ſtradayis/ nhe ka tee wiſẜi. Bett nhe es/
Manc1643_44_LVM_153_11bett Deewa ſchäläſtiba/ kattra eekſchan mann gir.

 @b{tra no}
  
 [156.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_156_1tra no Deewu papreekſch apſtipprenata gir/ vs CHriſtum/

 @b{ly rax-}
  
 [157.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_157_1ly raxtietz? Ka laſẜi tu? Tas adbilldeya vnd ẜatziya/ Töw
Manc1643_44_LVM_157_2buhß Deewu tawu Kungu mieļoht/ no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds/
Manc1643_44_LVM_157_3no wiſẜu Dwehſẜeli/ no wiſẜu Ꞩpähku/ vnnd no wiſẜu
Manc1643_44_LVM_157_4Prahtu/ vnnd tawu Tuwaku ka ẜöw paſſchu. Bett

Manc1643_44_LVM_157_6tad tu dſiewohſẜi.

Manc1643_44_LVM_157_17ya nohſt/ vnd atſtahya to puß nomirruſchu ghulloſchu.
Manc1643_44_LVM_157_18Bett tas lehzehß no nheyauſch/ ka weens Baßnizas=

Manc1643_44_LVM_157_24ſchäloyahß tas ẜöw par to/ vnd peeghaya py to/ ẜaſẜehya
Manc1643_44_LVM_157_25tam winja Wahtes/ vnd lehya tam eekſchan ölye vnnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_157_26Wienu. Vnd zehle to vs ẜawu Lohpu/ vnnd wedde to

Manc1643_44_LVM_157_28Deenà brautze tas nohſt/ vnd ißwilka diwi Ghroſſchus/
 @b{vnd}
  
 [158.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_158_1vnd dewe tohß tam Ꞩaimneekam/ vnnd ẜatziya vs to:
Manc1643_44_LVM_158_2Ghlabba to/ vnnd ja tu ko wairahk ißdohſẜi/ ghribbu es
Manc1643_44_LVM_158_3töw to attmaxaht att=eedamms{attee=damms}. Kattru ſkeetees tu/ no
Manc1643_44_LVM_158_4ſcheems trimms to Tuwaku äſẜam biyuſchu tam/ kat-
Manc1643_44_LVM_158_5tram ſtarrp Släppkaweem ghaddiyahß? Tas ẜatziya/
Manc1643_44_LVM_158_6Tas/ katters ſchälaſtibu tam darriya. Tad ẜatziya JE-
Manc1643_44_LVM_158_7ſus vs to: Tad ey prohyam/ vnd darri tha arridſan.

Manc1643_44_LVM_158_12Meeſẜi ghribbahß prettie to Gharru/ vnd tam Ghar-

Manc1643_44_LVM_158_14juhß nhe darraht/ ko juhß ghribbaht. Bett ja jums tas
Manc1643_44_LVM_158_15Gharrs wallda/ tad nhe eſẜeta juhß appackſchan to Bauß-

Manc1643_44_LVM_158_17Laulibas Pahrkahpſchana/ Mauziba/ nheſkieſtiba/ Beßkauni-
Manc1643_44_LVM_158_18ba/ Ällkadeewiba/ Burrwiba/ Eeneidiba/ Bahrſchana/ Ee-

Manc1643_44_LVM_160_3MYeļi Brahļi/ ja mehß eekſchan Gharru dſiewoyam/
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_4tad laideeta mums arridſan eekſchan Gharru ſtai-
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_5ghaht. Nhe laideeta mums pehtz to neezigu Ghohdu
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_6kahrotees/ neds dußmotees muhſẜo ſtarrpà/ neds eeniedeh-
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_7tees. Myļi Brahļi/ ja kahds Zillwähx no kahdas wainas
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_8pahrſteicktz tohp/ tad palliedſeeta tam attkal ar lehnprahtigu
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_9Gharru/ juhß kattri juhß Gharrigi eſẜeeta. Vnd luhkoyees
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_10vs ẜöw paſſchu/ ka tu arridſan nhe tohpi kahrdenahtz. Weens
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_11laid pannäß ohtra Naßtu/ tad juhß to Baußlu CHriſti pee-
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_12pilldieeſẜeta. Bett ja kaßlabba domatu/ täs äſẜohtz kas/ vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_13tas tomähr nhe gir nheneeka/ tas peewiļļahß ẜöw pattz. Bett
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_14ickweens laid luhko vs ẜawu paſſchu darrbu/ vnnd tad buhß
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_15tam py ẜöw paſſcham Ghohds/ vnd nhe py zittu. Aiſto ick
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_16weens ẜawu Naßtu neſẜies.
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_17Bett tas kas pamahzietz tohp ar to Wahrdu/ tam buhß
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_18ißdallieth wiſẜu labbumu tam kas to pamahza. Nhe alloyee-
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_19tees/ Deews nhe leekahß apſmeetees. Aiſto ko tas Zillwähx
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_20ẜeh/ to tas pļaws. Kas vs to Meeſẜu ẜeh/ tas no to Meeſẜu to
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_21ẜamaitaſchanu pļaws. Bett kas vs to Gharru ẜeh/ tas no to

Manc1643_44_LVM_160_23mums labbe darriet/ vnd nhe peekuſt. Aiſto ẜawà laikà mehß
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_24arridſan pļauſẜim bes mitteſchanas. Kad mums nu laix gir/
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_25tad laideeta mums labbe darrieth ick=kattram/ bett wißwai-
Manc1643_44_LVM_160_26rahk py tahß Titzibas draugheems.

 @b{wällk}
  
 [165.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_1wällk Ꞩwähtà deenà. Vnnd tee nhe warraya winjam
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_2nhe neeka vs to atkal adbildeht.
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_3Bett wings ẜatziya weenu Liedſibu teem Weeſẜeem/
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_4nomannidams/ ka tee wehleyahß auxtakà weetà ẜeh-
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_5deht/ vnd ẜatziya vs teem: Kad tu no weenu aitzenahts
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_6kļuhſti Kahſahß/ tad nhe ẜehdees auxtakà Weetà/ ka nhe
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_7nahx kahds zeenigahx/ nhe ka tu/ kas no winju aitzenahts
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_8gir. Vnd kad tas tad nahk/ kas töw vnd winju aitzena-
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_9yis gir/ vs töw ẜacka/ wirrſees ſchim/ vnd töw buhß tad
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_10ar Kaunu ſämmoyà weetà ẜehdeht. Bett kad tu aitze-
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_11nahts kļuhſti/ tad no=ey/ vnnd ẜehdees ſämmoyà weetà/
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_12kad tas nahk/ kas töw aitzenayis gir/ vs töw ẜacka:
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_13Draugs/ wirrſees aukſcham. Tad buhß töw Ghohds
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_14preekſchan teems/ kattri ar töw py Ghalldu ſehſch. Aiſto
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_15kas ẜöw patz auxtenayahß{autztenayahß}/ tam buhß ſämmotam tapt/
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_16vnnd kas ẜöw patz ſämmoyahß/ tam buhß auxtena-
Manc1643_44_LVM_165_17tam tapt.

 @b{Ta gir}
  
 [172.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_1Ta gir nu ohtra Syme/ kattru JEſus darriya/ nahk-

Manc1643_44_LVM_172_3@v{Epiſtel am zwey=vnd=zwantzigſten Sontage}
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_4@v{nach Trinitatis/ Philipp. 1.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_5MYļi Braļi/ Es patteitzu mannam Deewam/ zeekahrt es
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_6juhſẜo peeminu (kattru es allaſch darru/ wiſẜohß man-
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_7nohß Patarohß par jums wiſẜeem/ vnd darru tohß Pa-
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_8tarus ar Lyxmibu) par juhſẜu Draudſibu py to Ewangelio/
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_9no pirrmahß Deenas ihß ſcho. Vnd äßmu labba zerribà/ ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_10tas/ katters eekſchan jums eeẜahzis gir to labbu darrbu/ tas
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_11to arridſan pabeix/ ihß tai Deeny JEſu CHriſti/ ka man
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_12tad peedärr/ tha no jums wiſẜeems zerreht/ Tapehts ka es
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_13jums mannà Ꞩirdy turru/ ſchinni mannà zeetumà/ kur es
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_14to Ewangelium aißbilldu/ vnnd apſtippru/ ka juhß wiſẜi ar
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_15man to ſchälaſtibu dabbuyuſchi eſẜeeta.
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_16Aiſto Deews gir mans Leezeneex/ ka mannai Ꞩirrdei
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_17ſchäle gir pehts jums ekſchan JEſu CHriſto/ vnnd par to
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_18luhdſcho es/ ka juhſẜa myleſtiba jo Deenas jo wairahk bag-
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_19gata tohp/ wiſẜenadà atſiſchanà vnd ẜajuſẜchanà/ ka juhß bau-
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_20dyht warraht/ kas labbahx gir/ ka juhß tyre vnnd nhe pee-
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_21dauſighi eſẜeeta ihß tai Deeny CHriſti/ peepillditi ar au-
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_22gļeems tahß Taißnibas/ kattra zaur JEſum CHriſtum no-
Manc1643_44_LVM_172_23tikuſẜi gir (eekſchan jums) Deewam par Ghodu vnd Ꞩlawu.

 @b{by tam}
  
 [173.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_1by tam deßmitz tuhxtoſchus Pohdus parrada. Kad tas
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_2nu nhe=ſpehya to maxaht/ pawehleya tas Kungs par-
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_3doht ẜöw/ ẜawu Ꞩeewu/ vnd ẜawus Bährnus/ vnd wis
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_4kas tam by/ vnd maxaht. Tad kritta tas Kallps ſemme/
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_5vnd peeluhdſe to/ vnnd ẜatziya/ Kungs/ eſẜi ar man ar
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_6Meeru/ es gribbu töw wiſẜunotaļ maxaht. Tad by tam
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_7Kungham ſchäl ta Kallpa/ vnd palaide to/ vnnd to
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_8Parradu atlaide tas tam arridſan.
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_9Tad ißghaya tas patz
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_10Kallps ara/ vnd attradda
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_11weenu no ẜaweem Beedra=
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_12kallpeem/ tas by tam ẜimb-
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_13tus Groſſchus parrada.
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_14Vnd tas ẜakampe to/ vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_15ſchņaudſe to/ vnnd ẜatziya/
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_16maxa man/ ko tu man par-
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_17rada eſẜi. Tad kritta winja
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_18Beedrakallps ſemme/ vnd luhdſe to/ vnd ẜatziya/ Eſẜi ar
Manc1643_44_LVM_173_19man ar Meeru/ es gribbu töw wiſẜunotaļ maxaht. Bett

Manc1643_44_LVM_173_27dis/ kad tu man luhdſi/ nhe by töw tad arridſan abſchä-

 @b{ſchäloyohß?}
  
 [174.lpp.]

Manc1643_44_LVM_174_5Ꞩirrdeems ick weens ẜawam Brahļam ẜawu Wainu.

 @b{JEſus}
  
 [178.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_1JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem Mahzekļeem: Kad juhß
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_2nu redſeſẜeeta to nhe ghanntibu tahß ißpohſtiſcha-
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_3nas/ no kattru ẜatzietz gir zaur to Proweetu Daniel/ ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_4tas ſtahw eekſchan to ẜwähtu weetu/ kas to laſẜa/ tam
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_5buhß to labb abdohmaht. Tad laid bähg wirſẜon teem
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_6Kallneem/ kas Juddo=Semmeh gir/ vnd kas wirs
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_7Jumbtu gir/ tas laid nhe kahp ſemmeh/ ko labb no ẜawu
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_8Nammu attneſteeß. Vnd kas wirrs Lauku gir/ tas laid
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_9nhe attghreeſchahß ẜawas
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_10Drehbes attneßtees. Bett
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_11wai teem apgruhtenateem/
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_12vnd Sieſchameem tanny
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_13laikà. Bett luhdſeeta ka juhſ-
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_14ẜa{kajuhſẜa} behkſchana nhe lätzahß
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_15Seemà jeb Ꞩwehdeenà/ ai-
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_16ſto tad tahdas leelas bäh-
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_17das buhß/ ka nhe gir biyu-
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_18ẜchi no Eeẜakumu tahß Paſẜaules/ ihß ſchim/ vnd ka ar-
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_19ridſan wairs nhe buhß. Vnd ja ẜchahß Deenas nhe tap-
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_20tu pa=ihſẜenatas/ tad nhe taptu nhe weens Zillwähx
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_21ẜwähtz. Bett to Jßrädſäto dehļ tohp tahß Deenas pa=
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_22iſẜenatas.
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_23Ja tad kaßlabban vs jums ẜatzies/ Redſeeta/ ſcheit
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_24gir CHriſtus/ jeb tur/ tad nhe buhß jums to titzeht/ aiſto
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_25nhe vstitzami CHriſti/ vnd nhe=vstitzami Proweetes
Manc1643_44_LVM_178_26ißdohſẜees/ vnd leelas Siemes vnd brienumus darris/

Manc1643_44_LVM_178_28peewillſchanà peewillti taptu. Redſeeta/ es äßmu
 @b{jums}
  
 [179.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_1jums to papreekſch ẜatziyis. Tapehtz/ kad tee vs jums
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_2ẜatzies/ redſeeta/ tas gir Tuxneſẜy/ tad nhe eita aran/ red-
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_3ſeeta/ tas gir Kambary/ tad nhe titzaht. Aiſto ihten ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_4tas Sibbänes ißlätz no Rieta puſẜes/ vnd attſpied ihß
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_5Wackara puſẜes/ ta buhß arridſan ta Attnahkſchana
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_6tha zillwäka Dähla. Aiſto kurr Maita gir/ turr ẜa-
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_7ckrahyahß tee Ehrgļi.
  
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_8@v{Epiſtel am 26. Sontage nach Trinitatis/}
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_9@v{2. Petr. 3.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_10MJeļi Brahļi/ ſinnaita to papreekſch/ ka eekſchan pehdi-
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_11gahm Deenahm nahx Ꞩmehyehyi/ kattru pehtz ẜawu
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_12paſſchu Prahtu dſiewohß/ vnd ẜatzies/ Kur gir ta ẜoh-
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_13liſchana winja (Deewa) atnahkſchanas? Aiſto pehtz to ka tee
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_14Tähwi aismigguſchi gir/ palleck wiſẜas leetas/ ta ka tahß no
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_15Eeẜakumu tahß Raddibas bijuſchas gir. Bett nhe ghribbä-
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_16dammi nhe ghribb tee ſinnaht/ ka ta Debbes pirrmayohß
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_17laikohß arridſan by/ ta lieds arridſan ta Semme/ no Vdeni
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_18vnd eekſchan Vdeni biyuſẜi zaur Deewa Wahrdu/ vnd to-
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_19mähr tappa tanny laikà ta Paſẜaule zaur teem paſſcheem ar
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_20to Vdens ghräku (zaur to wahrdu vnd Vdeni.) ẜamaitata.
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_21Ta arridſan ta Debbes/ kattra taggad gir/ vnd ta Semme/
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_22tohp zaur winja Wahrdu ẜaudẜäta/ ka tee tam Vggunim paſ-
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_23ẜarghati tohp/ py to Deenu tahß Ꞩohdibas/ vnd py paſu-
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_24denaſchanas to behßdeewigo Zillwäko. Bett weenai leetai nhe
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_25buhß jums paẜlähptai buht/ juhß mieligi/ ka weena Deena
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_26preekſchan to Kungu gir ka tuhxtoſchi ghaddi/ vnd tuhxtoſchi
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_27ghaddi ka weena Deena. Tas Kungs nhe kawe to Ꞩohliſcha-
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_28na/ ka daſchi to weenu kaweſchanu ſkeet/ bett tas gir lehniegs
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_29ar mums/ vnnd nhe ghribb/ ka kamlabban buhß paſuſtam
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_30tapt/ bett ka ick=kattris no Ghräkeems attſtahyahß.
Manc1643_44_LVM_179_31Bett ta Deena ta Kunga nahx/ ka kahds Sagglis nackty/
 @b{eekſchan}
  
 [180.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_180_1eekſchan kattru tahß Debbeſẜes ißniex/ ar leelu brackſchkeſcha-
Manc1643_44_LVM_180_2nu/ bett tee Eẜakumi no karrſtamu ißkuſẜies/ vnd ta Semme/
Manc1643_44_LVM_180_3vnd tee Darrbi/ kattri tur eekſchan gir/ taps ẜadädſenati.
Manc1643_44_LVM_180_4Kad nu tam ta wiſẜam buhß ißniekt/ ka buhß jums tad
Manc1643_44_LVM_180_5ẜattaiſẜitees? Ar ẜwätu dſiewoſchanu vnd buhſchanu kattra

Manc1643_44_LVM_180_8niex/ vnnd tee Eeẜakumi no karrſtumu ißkuſẜies. Bett mehß
Manc1643_44_LVM_180_9ẜaghaidam weenu jaunu Debbes/ vnd weenu jaunu Semm/
Manc1643_44_LVM_180_10ka wings ẜohliyis gir/ eekſchan kattras Taißniba dſiewo.

 @b{yuſchi/}
  
 [181.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_181_1yuſchi/ es äßmu ißtwiezis biyis/ vnd juhß eſẜeeta mann

 @b{ſchu}
  
 [182.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_182_1ſchu/ jeb Weeſẜi/ jeb plicku/ jeb Nhewäſẜälu/ jeb zeetumà/

 @b{Saulus}
  
 [186.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_1SAulus ẜchņahze wehl draudädams vnd kaudams/ pret-
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_2tie teem Mahzekļeem ta Kunga. Vnd ghaya py Auxtu=
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_3baſnizaskungu/ vnd luhdſe tam Ghramatas vs Da-
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_4maſco py teem Skohlneekeem/ ja tas kahdus vs to paſſchu
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_5zeļļu attraſtu Wierus vnd Ꞩeewas/ wings tohß ẜaſẜeetus
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_6wäßtu vs Jeruſalemes. Vnd kad wings vs zeļļu by/ vnd tu-
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_7we py Damaſco nahze/ apſpiedeya winju peepehſch weena
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_8Ghaißma no Däbbäſẜu/ vnd kritta py Semmes/ vnd dſirr-
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_9deya weenu ballxni/ ta ẜatziya vs winju/ Saul/ Saul/ ko tu
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_10mann prettie{prittie} ſtahwi? Bett wings ẜatziya: Kungs/ kas eſẜi
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_11tu? Tas Kungs ẜatziya/ Es äßmo JEſus/ kattram tu pret-
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_12tie ſtahw. Töw ghruht nahxees prettie Ꞩkähpu ẜpahrdiet.
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_13Vnnd wings ẜatziya trieſẜädams vnd biedams/ Kungs/ ko

Manc1643_44_LVM_186_18vnnd by pahrbiyuſchees/ Aiſto tee dſirrdeya weenu ballxni/
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_19vnd nhe redſeya nhe weenu. Bett Saulus zehlehß aukſcham

Manc1643_44_LVM_186_22wedde to vs Damaſco/ vnd nhe warreya trieyaß Deenahs
Manc1643_44_LVM_186_23redſeht/ ney ähßdams/ ney dſärrdams.

 @b{mums}
  
 [193.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_1mums to Tähwu/ tad gir mums ghann. JEſus ẜacka vs
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_2to: Tick illge äßmu es py jums/ vnd tu mann nhe paſieſti.
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_3Wilip (Lipſti/) kas mann räds/ tas räds to Tähwu/ ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_4ẜacki tu tad/ Rahdi mums to Tähwu? Nhe titzi tu/ ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_5es eekſchan to Tähwu/ vnd tas Tähws eekſchan mann
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_6gir? Tohß Wahrdus kattrus es vs jums runnayo/ tohß
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_7nhe runnayo es no ẜöw paſſchu. Bett tas Tähws kat-
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_8ters eekſchan mann dſiewo/ tas patz darra tohß darr-
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_9bus. Titzaht mann/ ka es eekſchan Tähwu/ vnnd tas
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_10Tähws eekſchan mann gir/ ja nhe/ tad titzaht jehle man
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_11to Darrbo dehļ. Pattees/ Pattees/ es ẜacko jums/ kas
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_12vs mann titz/ tas arridſan tohß darrbus darries/ kat-
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_13trus es darro/ vnd leelakus nhe ka ſchohß darries/ aiſto
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_14es eemo py Tähwu. Vnnd ko juhß luhxeeta eekſchan
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_15mannu Wahrdu/ to ghribbu es darriet/ ka tas Tähws
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_16ghohdahtz tohp eekſchan to Dählu. Ko juhß luhxeeta
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_17eekſchan mannu Wahrdu/ to ghribbu es darriet.

Manc1643_44_LVM_193_19@v{Eſaiae 40.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_20EEpreezenayeeta/ eepreezenayeeta mannus Ļaudis/ ẜacka
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_21juhſẜo Deews/ runnayeeta ar Jeruſalem ẜirrdige/ vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_22mahzaita tai/ ka winja (@l{a}) Darrbs pa ghallam gir/
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_23Aiſto winja Noſeedſiba gir peedohta/ aiſto ta gir diwekahr-

Manc1643_44_LVM_193_25dehļ.
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_26@l{a} (Darrbs) @v{Das im Hebreiſchen das Wort} ** @v{ſtehe/ weiß ich woll/}
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_27@v{vnnd daß es einem Streit/ oder Kriegsmacht heiſſe/ weiß ich auch}
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_28@v{wol/ daher auch GOtt/ der HErr Zebaoth/ das iſt der HErr der}
Manc1643_44_LVM_193_29@v{Heerſcharen genennet wird. Das ichs aber durchs Wort} (Darrbs/
 @b{welchs}
  
 [194.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_194_1@v{welchs heiſt eine Arbeit/ ein Werckt) gedolmetſcht/ daß hab ich vmb}
Manc1643_44_LVM_194_2@v{der eigentlichen meinung willen gethan/ die mir der gantze} @l{contex-}
Manc1643_44_LVM_194_3@l{tus} @v{an die hand gegeben. Denn was ſonſten obgedachtes Wort}

Manc1643_44_LVM_194_7Turr gir weens ballxnis weena Mahzetaya Tuxneſẜy/

 @b{gir?}
  
 [195.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_1gir? Vnd tee mirckſchkinaya (@l{propriè} @v{mit Augen}.) ẜawam
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_2Tähwam/ ka wings to ghribbätu dehweht lickt. Vnnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_3wings praſẜiya weenu ghalldinyu/ raxtiya vnd ẜatziya:
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_4Winja Wahrds gir Janis. Vnnd tee iſẜabrienoyahß
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_5wiſẜi/ vnd tuhdeļļ tappa winja Mutte vnnd Mehle att-
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_6ſwabbinata/ vnd runnaya Deewu ſlawädams. Vnnd

Manc1643_44_LVM_195_9nu. Vnd wiſẜi kattri to dſirrdeya/ jehmehß py Ꞩirrds/
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_10vnnd ẜatziya/ ko ſkeet tu/ kas buhß no ſcho Behrninju?
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_11Aiſto tha Kunga Rohka by ar to.
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_12Vnd winja Tähws Zacharias tappa pills no to ſwäh-
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_13tu Gharru/ mahziya/ ẜatzidams:
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_14Ꞩlawähtz gir tas Kungs/ tas Deews Jſrael/ Aiſto
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_15tas gir peemeckleyis/ vnd peſtiyis ẜawus Ļaudis.

Manc1643_44_LVM_195_17ſchanas/ eekſchan to Nammu ẜawa Kallpa Dawid.
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_18Ka tas pirrmayohß laikohß runnayis gir zaur to
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_19Mutt ẜawo ſwähto Proweeto.
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_20Ka tas mums peſtitu no muhſẜeem Eenaideneekeem/
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_21vnd no to Rohku wiſẜo tho kattri mums eenied.
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_22Vnnd to ſchäläſtibu paradietu muhſẜeem Tähweem/
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_23vnd attghada=tohß ẜawas ſwähtas ẜaliedſenaſchanas.

Manc1643_44_LVM_195_25muhſẜam Tähwam Abrahamam/ mums doht.

Manc1643_44_LVM_195_27Waideneeko/ vnnd tam Kallpoyam bes bieſchanas tick
Manc1643_44_LVM_195_28illge ka mehß dſiewoyam.
 @b{Eekſchan}
  
 [196.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_196_1Eekſchan Ꞩwehtibas vnnd Taißnibas/ kattra tam
Manc1643_44_LVM_196_2pattiek.
Manc1643_44_LVM_196_3Vnd tu Behrnings tapſi weens Proweetz tha Wiſẜa=
Manc1643_44_LVM_196_4auxtaka dähwähtz/ tu eeẜi preekſchan to Kungu/ ka tu
Manc1643_44_LVM_196_5tam to Zeļļu ẜataiſẜi.
Manc1643_44_LVM_196_6Vñ Adſiſchanu tahß Peſtiſchanas dohd ẜaweem Ļau-

Manc1643_44_LVM_196_10tahß Auxtibas.

Manc1643_44_LVM_196_13to zeļļu tha Meera.

Manc1643_44_LVM_196_15ſchan Gharru/ vnd by Tuxneſẜy/ teekams ka tam by preek-
Manc1643_44_LVM_196_16ſcha nahkt/ preekſchan teem Ļaudeem Jſrael.

Manc1643_44_LVM_197_1tanny paſſchà nackty ghulleya Peteris ſtarrpa diweem Kar-

Manc1643_44_LVM_197_4Vnd reds/ tas Engels ta Kungha attghaya/ vnd wee-

Manc1643_44_LVM_197_10Apmettees ẜawu Mehteli apkahrt ẜöw/ vnd nahtz ar mann.

Manc1643_44_LVM_197_12naya/ ka tas tam itt teeſcham noticktu zaur to Engeli/ bett
Manc1643_44_LVM_197_13tas ſkitta weenu ghiemi rädſohtz.
Manc1643_44_LVM_197_14Bett tee ghaya zaur to pirrmu vnd ohtru Wackti/ vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_197_15nahze py teem dſällſa Durrweem/ kattras vs Jällghawu eet/

Manc1643_44_LVM_197_19ſinnu es teeſcham/ ka tas Kungs ẜawu Engeli ẜuhtiyis gir/

Manc1643_44_LVM_197_21ẜarrghaſchanu to Juddo Ļauſcho.

 @b{Janis}

 @b{Eliſa-}
  
 [199.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_1Eliſabeth. Vnd tas notickahß/ kad Eliſabeth to Ꞩwei-
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_2zenaſchanu Mariae dſirrdeya/ deedams lehze tas
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_3Bährns winja Meeſẜahß. Vnnd Eliſabeth tappa no
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_4to Ꞩwähtu Gharru pilla/
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_5vnd brehze ſtippre/ ẜatzida-
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_6ma: Teickta eſẜi tu no
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_7tahm Ꞩeewahm/ vnd teick-
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_8ta gir ta Aughle tawas
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_9Meeſẜas/ vnd no kurrenes
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_10tas mann nahkahß/ ka tha
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_11Mahte manna Kungha
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_12py mann nahk? Redſi/ kad
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_13es to ballxni tawas Ꞩweizenaſchanas dſirrdeyu/ pree-
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_14zadammees lähze tas Bährns mannahß Meeſẜahß.
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_15Vnd O ſwähta eſẜi tu/ kattra tu titzeyuſẜi eſẜi/ Aiſto tas
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_16taps peepilldietz/ kas töw ẜatzietz gir no to Kungu.
  
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_17Vnd Maria ẜatziya.
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_18Manna Dwehſẜele teitz to Kunghu/ vñ manns Gharrs
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_19epreehzeenayahß par to Deewu mannu Peſtitayu.
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_20Aiſto tas gir to Sämmoſchanu ẜawas Kallpones
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_21vsraudſiyis/ Redſi no ſcho laiku mann ẜwätu teix wiſẜi/
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_22Bährno Bährni.
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_23Aiſto tas gir leelu leethu py man darriyis/ katters
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_24Spehziegs gir/ vnd kattra wahrds Swähtz gir.
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_25Vnd winja Schälaſtiba palleek no weenas Zilltas ihs
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_26ohtras/ py teems/ kattri to biya.
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_27Tas gir ſpehziegs ar ẜawu Ällkonu/ vnd ißkaiſẜa tohß
Manc1643_44_LVM_199_28kattri gräßni gir ẜawas Ꞩirds prahtà.
 @b{Tas}
  
 [200.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_1Tas gruſch tohß Spehzigus no to Kräſlu/ vnnd pa-
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_2zeļļ tohs Sämmoſchus aukſcham.
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_3Tohß Jßallkuſchus peepillda tas arr Labbibu/ vnnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_4attſtay tohs Baggatus tuckſchus.
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_5Tas peeminn tahs ſchälaſtibas/ vnnd vspallieds ẜa-
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_6wam Kallpam Jſrael.
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_7Ka tas gir runnayis muhſẜeem Tähweem/ Abraham
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_8vnd winja Ꞩäklam muhſchige.
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_9Vnnd Maria palicka py tahs py trim Mehneſẜeem/
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_10pehtz greeſehs ta attkal vs Mahyu.
  
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_11@v{Epiſtel am S. Michaelis tage/}
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_12@v{Apocal. 12.}
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_13WEens Karrſch pazehlees ẜöw Debbeſẜies/ Mickelis vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_14winja Engeļi Karŗoya ar to Satana/ vnd tas Sata-
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_15nas Karŗoya/ vnd winja Engeļi/ vnd nhe vswahreya/
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_16neds arridſan winjo Weeta tappa Debbeſẜies attraſta. Vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_17tas leels Puhkis/ ta wätza Tſchuhßka/ kattrai wahrds gir
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_18tas Wälls vnd Satanas tappa ißmäſtz/ katters wiſẜu to
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_19Paſẜaul ar Wiltu wadda/ vnd tappa mäſtz wirſẜon Sem̃es/
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_20vnd winja Engeļi tappa arridſan nomäſti.
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_21Vnd es dſirrdeya weenu leelu bàllxne/ ta ẜatziya Deb-
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_22beſẜies/ Nu gir ta Peſtiſchana/ vnd tas Spähx/ vnd ta
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_23Wallſtiba/ vnd ta Warra muhſẜa Deewa/ ẜawa CHriſtus
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_24tappuſẜi/ tapehtz ka tas ißmäſtz gir/ katters tohß apẜuhdſeya
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_25Deenas vnd Nacktis preekſchan Deewu. Vnd tee gir to vs-
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_26warreyuſchi zaur ta Jähra Aſẜini/ vnd zaur to Wahrdu ẜa-
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_27was leezibas/ vnd nhe gir ẜawu dſiewibu mieļoyuſchi/ ihß to
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_28Nahwu. Tapehtz liexmoyeetees juhs Debbeſẜes/ vnd kattri
Manc1643_44_LVM_200_29tur eekſchan dſiewo.

 @b{ſchan}
  
 [202.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_202_1ſchan dſiewoſchanas Tiſlis/ jeb Krohplis ee=ey/ nhe ka

 @b{mi tahß}

Manc1643_44_LVM_207_1mi tahs attdarriet/ katras ar ſtipprahm Attſlägham vnnd Dſällſa=
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_2klinckeem by apdarrinatas/ gir ẜów paſſchas app to ẜäßtu Stundu
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_3Nackty attdarriyuſchaß. 21. Junij. App Ꞩehna laiku gir rädſäti

Manc1643_44_LVM_207_7keem/ kad tee Baßnizaskungi eekſchan to Baßnizu ghribbeyuſchi
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_8ẜattaiſẜiet/ kas vs Ꞩwähtkeem wayadſeya/ gir tee leelu dimbdu/
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_9vnd pehtz weenu Ballxni dſirrdeyuſchi/ kattra gir brähkuſẜi/ laidee-
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_10ta mums no ſchennenes nohſt behgt. Jeb tomähr zitti ẜacka/ tas
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_11äſẜohtz to laiku no titzis/ kad tas preekſchkarrayams Autz Baßnizà
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_12CHriſto mirrſtoht/ gir ẜaplieſẜis.
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_13Tur gir arridſan weens Zillwähx biyis/ JEſus/ Anani däh-
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_14wähtz/ nabbaga Wiera Dähls/ tas patz nahkdams Jeruſalemeh
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_15vs teem Waſẜaraſwähtkeem/ gir ar leelu ſtippru Gharru brehzis:

Manc1643_44_LVM_207_17Wackara puſẜes/ ick weena Kleekſchana no tſchettreem Wehyeem/
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_18weena Kleekſchana par wiſẜu Jeruſalem vnnd to Baßnizu/ weena

Manc1643_44_LVM_207_20wiſẜeem Ļaudeem. Vnd ta wings Deenas vnd Nacktis waideya/

Manc1643_44_LVM_207_24Wings nhe zeete kluß.
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_25Vnnd kad ſchiß Zillwähx preekſchan to Semmeſẜohgi no=
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_26wäſts gir/ kattru tee Römeŗi eelickuſchi by/ katters to arridſan ar
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_27Patagahm ghauſche lieds patt Aſẜinim ſchauſt licka/ tomähr nhe
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_28gir Wings nhe ar weenu Wahrdu ſchälaſtibu luhdſees/ nei kahdu.
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_29Aſẜaru ißlaidis/ bett bes mitteſchanas wiſẜà ghallwà brehzis/

Manc1643_44_LVM_207_33weens ghayis/ ka kahds Zillwähx kas kolabb ļohte py ẜöw paſſcham
Manc1643_44_LVM_207_34apdohma/ vnd gir allaſchien ſchoß Wahrdus brehzis/ Way/ Way
 @b{töw}
  
 [208.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_1töw/ O tu nabbaga Jeruſalem. Vnnd no tahdas brehkſchanas
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_2nhe gir Wings apnitzis.
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_3Vnd kad nu ta Pils no teem Römeŗeem gr apẜähſta biyuſẜi/
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_4gir wings wirſẜu teem Muhŗeem apkahrt ſtaighayis/ vnd allaſchiẽ
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_5brehzis/ Way par ta Baſnizu/ Way par wiſẜeem Ļaudeem. Vnd
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_6wiß pehdige gir wings arridſan ẜchohß nhe=eraſtus Wahrdus klaht
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_7ẜatziyis/ Way irr mann. Vnd to ẜatzidams gir wings no nheyau-
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_8ſche no to Waideneeko ẜchaudiſchanu aißjämtz/ vnd ta nomirris.
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_9Ꞩchahß vnd zittas leelas Siemes gir papreekſch rädſätas/ pirms
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_10Jeruſalem ißpohſtita tappa. Nu ghribbam mehß no tahß paſſchas
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_11ißpoſtiſchanas arridſan magkeniet runnaht.
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_12Kad tee Juddi/ ka Steppings ẜacka/ ka Ꞩläppkawi vnd Will-
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_13tineeki/ to taißnu vnd nhenoſeeguſchu CHriſtum nokahwyſchi by/
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_14gir tee ar wiſẜu to Juddo Wallſtibu eekſchan wiſẜahm leetahm alla-
Manc1643_44_LVM_208_15ſchien nicknake tappuſchi. Tee Auxtibaſnizaskungi eeẜahka/ vñ darrija

Manc1643_44_LVM_208_19ẜahm leetahm by zittade tapt/ vnd tai Wallſtibai ẜajuckt. No tah-

Manc1643_44_LVM_208_21ſtarrpà zehlehß ẜahwahds Pullx draugs py draughu/ vnd no to att-

 [209.lpp.]

 @b{Jebſche}
  
 [213.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_1Jebſche nu leela breeßmiba teitan by jaräds/ tad tomähr wiſẜas lee-
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_2tas teem Romeŗeem ißdewehß/ vnd nhe by wairs ney Vswahreſcha-
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_3nas ney Laimes py teem Juddeem. Kad nu tee Romeri to Pili vsjä-
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_4muſchi by/ dewe tas Trummeteris ar to Baſun weenu ſiem/ vnd tap-
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_5pa tee{teee} Juddi/ kattri to Pili turreya/ wiſẜi nokauti/ zitti no to Muhri
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_6nomäßti/ zitti gir paſſchi nomättuſſchees vnd nomirruſchi/ zitti gir
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_7Nackty peepehſch eekſchan to Jällgawu bähguſſchi. Pehtz gir tee
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_8Kaŗŗaļaudis vs teem kattri to Baſnizu turreya ſtippre mahkuſſchees.
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_9Titus ghribbeyis to Baßnizu ſchäloht/ bett Deews tha nolicka/ ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_10wiſẜa ſchäloſchana pa ghallam by. Aiſto kad ghann illge vnd ar wiſẜu
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_11ſpähku karŗohtz vñ ſtrahdahtz by/ vnd tee Juddi ney ar Draudeſchanu
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_12ney ar Pahr=Runnaſchanu tahß ſtippras Weetas vsdoht ghribbeya
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_13nomanniya tee Karraļaudis/ ka teem tanny weeta nhe warrätu zittade

Manc1643_44_LVM_213_18teicktz by ẜadädſenahtz vnd pällnohß tappis.

Manc1643_44_LVM_213_22gir leelo luhkſchano luhguſchi/ tohß dſiewus attſtaht/ bett teitan nhe
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_23gir ſchälaſtiba py Deewu vnd Zillwäkeem attraſtina biyuſẜi. Titus/

Manc1643_44_LVM_213_25wakallpoſchana pohſt gir/ tad irr to Baſnizaskungo nhe wayagoht.
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_26Ta Jßpoſtiſchana tahß Baſnizas gir notickuſẜi vs patt Lab-
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_27rentſcha Deenu/ 10. Auguſti, ihtt vs to Deenu/ kad ta pirrma
Manc1643_44_LVM_213_28Baſniza no to Babylonieŗo Koniņu ẜadädſenata gir. Vnnd gir

 [215.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_215_1dohmadammi py wiſẜeem Juddeem Sälltu attraſt/ wairahk nhe ka

Manc1643_44_LVM_215_4leyis/ ka nhe by tohß ghyhſtitus kaut vnd murriet.
Manc1643_44_LVM_215_5Pehdige gir ta Jällgawa Jeruſalem vsjämbta/ vnd teitan gir
Manc1643_44_LVM_215_6neds Jauns neds Wätz ſchählohtz/ tomähr gir pawehlähtz/ ka by

Manc1643_44_LVM_215_8loht. Tha gir wiſẜa Jeruſalem zaur zaurem no teem Waidenekeem

 @b{Robeſcha.)}
  
 [216.lpp.]
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_1Robeſcha) Bett kad ta baggata/ ißteickta/ ſwähta Pills Jeruſalem
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_2ißpohſtita gir/ tappa ſkaititi no eeẜakumu tahß Paſẜaules tſchettri
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_3tuhxtoſchi trießdeßmittz vñ tſchettri ghaddi. No{Nom} eeſakumu tahß Pills
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_4Rom aſtoņiẜimbti diwideßmittz vnd tries Ghaddi. Pehtz to ka
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_5CHriſtus mohzietz by zättortà deßmitty Ghaddà. Ta gir Jeruſa-
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_6lem/ ta wiſẜa ißteickta Pills eekſchan Auſtruma Semmes weenu
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_7breeßmigu ghallu jähmuſẜi.
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_8Ta gir Deews to Nitziſchanu vnd Pullgoſchanu ta Ewan-
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_9gelij ẜohdiyis/ vnd wiſẜai Paſẜaulei weenu breeßmigu Mahzibu dewis/
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_10tohß pamahziet Deewa dußmibu vnd ẜohdibu byht/ vnd ẜöw py
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_11Deewu vnd Chriſti Attſiſchanas attgreeſt. Aiſto ja Deews nhe gir
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_12ſcho Ļauſcho ſchäloyis/ kattreem wings tick krahßnas Ꞩoliſchanas
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_13dewis/ kurr tick dauds leeli ſwähti Proweetes vnd wätzi Tähwi bi-
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_14yuſſchi/ ja/ kattra Chriſto Aſẜinies Raddi biya/ ka tad wings ghau-
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_15ſchake nhe ẜohdies/ zittus Ļaudis/ kattreem no ẜawadas ſchälaſti-
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_16bas tas Ewangeliums dohtz gir/ vnd tee tomähr nhepatteitzigi gir/
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_17vnnd iſtänu Deewa kallpoſchanu vnd Attſiſchanu nitzina/ vnnd ar
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_18leelaku zeetaku Ꞩirrdi pullgo/ ka muhſſcham Paſẜauleh nhe gir no
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_19titzis. Tapehtz gir tas ghann tees/ ta Ꞩohdiba nhe buhß tahle/
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_20vnd teem notix/ kas Jeruſalemey notitzis gir. To buhß mums no
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_21Ꞩirrds apdomaht/ ka mehß attſtayammees no Ghräkeem/
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_22vnd eekſchan ihſtänas Attſiſchanas CHriſti att-
Manc1643_44_LVM_216_23greeſchammeeß.
